example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS امضت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC اعوام) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN طفولت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)))) (UCP-ADV (S (PUNC ") (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ترتع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)))) (CONJ و) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تسرح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN بساتين) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN بلدت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المحبوبة))))))) (PUNC "))

arg.g: In the gardens of her beloved village
